message: Let's split it evenly, it's a fair start!
You rejected my chance at a fair split, now it's my turn to make a move!
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect too much more!
You think 55 is a'slightly better deal'? I think I can do better than that!
I'm starting to get a little desperate, but I'm still holding out for a better deal!
Desperate? You're just getting started! I'm not afraid to take a bigger cut now!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll meet you halfway, but don't think this is a sign of weakness!
